General.Name: PT Selaras Citra Nusantara Perkasa Tbk
General.Description: PT Selaras Citra Nusantara Perkasa Tbk produces and sells household appliance products and medical devices in Indonesia. It offers blenders, electric irons, gas stoves, electric fans, and air purifiers, as well as UVC sterilizer cabinets. The company is headquartered in Bogor, Indonesia. PT Selaras Citra Nusantar Perkasa Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Sena Dwimakmur.
General.Address: Dusun Pasir Angin RT. 003 RW. 004, Bogor, Indonesia, 16820

3.Name: Mr. Deri Meidian Ramdhani
